thread.section_title: CORGI HomePlan Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CORGI HomePlan | corgihomeplan.co.uk | 13 of 179
thread.title: Mr Rose
thread.title_full: CORGI HomePlan reviewed by Mr Rose

author: Mr Rose
title: Mr Rose
text: I had a leak on my heating system and contacted Corgi under my home care plan. The call centre got onto the problem immediately and called out an engineer. He made two visits to identify the problem, and then Corgi arranged for the boiler manufacturers engineer to visit and replace the affected parts. All of this was done within a couple of weeks. The boiler is working perfectly now.
